title: Does anyone know the name of this font?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050645im_/http:/typophile.com/files/save-ferris1-800x400_5827.jpg)
  
Seen it several times, did not like it but when a friend asked, bragged about knowing all fonts – just too old to remember names ...
author: rainerdempf

comments.content: From the look of it, I'd say the sign painter fell asleep while poring over specimens of Eurostile and Antique Olive, and this lettering came to him in a dream.
Steile Futura it is, thank you!
